short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BitStash Wallet extension is used for signing transactions, logging into dapps, sending and recieving STASH or BRC20 tokens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A BitStash Wallet in your Browser

The BitStash Wallet extension is used for accessing decentralized applications built on the BitStash Blockchain right in your browser. 

By using the BitStash web3 API into every website's javascript context, so DAPPs can read this data from the blockchain. 

Easily create a new wallet, import from seed phrase or private key, send and receive STASH and BRC20 tokens, create smart contracts, access dapps, nfts, and so much more.

The BitStash Wallet extension adds functionality to your normal browser context, BitStash will require your permission to read and write to any webpage. Just like with any extension you can "view the source" of the BitStash Wallet the way you do with any Chrome extension. Additionally you can also view the source code on GitHub here: 
https://github.com/BitStashBlockchain/bitstash-extension

Enable access to the following with the BitStash Wallet extension:
- Decentralized Finance (DeFi)
- Decentralized Applications (DAPPs)
- Non Fungible Tokens (NFTs)
- Bridged Assets
- BRC20 Tokens
- and more!
